title: AWS Generative AI Accelerator Cohort Announcement 2025
text:
Introducing the 40 startups selected from around the world for the 2025 AWS Generative AI Accelerator

Meet the next generation of startups from across the globe expanding the scope of what’s possible with generative AI and AWS.

AWS is proud to announce the 40 startups participating in the 2025 global AWS Generative AI Accelerator Cohort. This initiative is a key part of our $230 million commitment to enrich the landscape of generative AI by fostering the next generation of pioneers, helping them turn ambitious ideas into transformative solutions that shape the future of technology.

The program kicks off October 14 at our Amazon HQ in Seattle with learning, mentorship, and leadership from AWS domain experts as well as a curated network of industry leaders and experts from top AI companies. It all concludes with a showcase at AWS re:Invent in Las Vegas, NV in December.

“Whether it’s in biotech labs, creative studios, or industrial applications, the pace of generative AI is extraordinary, and it’s happening everywhere,” says Sherry Karamdashti, General Manager & Head of Startups in North America at AWS. “This year’s Cohort reinforces our mission to help that innovation move fast and deliver real-world impact for customers in every industry. We’re removing the barriers and acceleration opportunities so these leaders can grow their world-changing solutions.”

40 bold, visionary startups were selected from a field of thousands of applicants spanning every corner of the globe. With an acceptance rate of less than 2%, a diverse committee of AWS startup experts and program partners chose the Cohort for the strength of their ideas, technical readiness, and interview performance.

Supporting the new AI vanguard

Startups participating in the program each receive up to $1 million in AWS credits to fuel their development and scaling needs, as well as go-to-market support, and business and technical mentorship.

Presenting the 40 AWS Generative AI Accelerator program participants

Asia Pacific

Hyperbots | Industry: Financial Services | Location: India

Hyperbots helps CFOs with over 90% productivity gain for end-end finance processes with their agentic AI F&A platform powered by HyperLM, the first ever F&A LLM.

Mary Technology | Industry: Legal Technology| Location: Australia

Mary Technology helps law firms & internal legal teams understand the facts locked inside of documents using their world-leading fact management system.

RLWRLD | Industry: Computers & Electronics | Location: South Korea

RLWRLD helps industrial leaders automate complex physical tasks by providing real-world robotics foundation models built on high-precision dexterity and industry data.

SCB 10X | Industry: Fintech | Location: Thailand

Typhoon unlocks Thai language understanding with open-source multimodal language models and tools optimized for Thai developers, researchers and businesses.

SDio | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: Japan

SDio transforms long-duration videos into searchable intelligence using AI built for deep, multi-stream analysis.

Smallest AI | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: India

Smallest AI builds foundational Voice AI models to automate real-time communications in enterprise contact centers.

Stimuler | Industry: Education | Location: India

Stimuler is a voice AI app to help billions of non-native speakers become fluent in English, primarily via speaking instead of studying it.

SyntheticGestalt | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: Japan

SyntheticGestalt helps life science companies accelerate scientific discovery by providing them with the world’s largest molecular-focused foundation AI model.

Trillion Labs | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: South Korea

Trillion Labs is advancing AI with cutting-edge language models for Korean and Asian languages that bridge cultures and redefine what’s possible.

Latin America

AI Cube | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: Brazil

AI Cube delivers no-code AI automation to streamline tasks and enhance efficiency. Their flexible AI makes automation effortless and transforms workflows for everyone.

Dharma.ai | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: Brazil

Dharma-AI provides scalable, efficient and secure enterprise-scale AI solutions with proprietary SLMs for OCR and industrial maintenance.

Forlex | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: Brazil

Forlex helps legal enterprises and professionals revolutionize every aspect of legal work by providing a suite of agents and custom multilingual sovereign AI models.

Qomplement | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: Mexico

Qomplement helps enterprises automate repetitive back-office tasks across legacy systems with a computer-use agent.

Sythnera AI | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: Colombia

Synthera helps finance teams model fixed income and macro regimes using AI simulations to uncover market patterns and risks.

North America

Basetwo AI | Industry: Manufacturing | Location: Canada

Basetwo helps engineers optimize pharmaceutical manufacturing in real-time with an AI copilot that turns plant data into next-best-action recommendations.

Chai Discovery | Industry: Healthcare | Location: United States

Chai Discovery trains frontier models to engineer better molecules using artificial intelligence. They are building the “computer-aided design suite” for molecules.

Dayhoff Labs | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: United States

Stealth.

Eloquent AI | Industry: Finance | Location: United States

Eloquent AI is the first AI operator built for the financial services industry, automating complex, regulated operations —no APIs or engineering required.

Exaforce | Industry: Cybersecurity | Location: United States

Exaforce’s full-lifecycle AI SOC platform empowers security teams with AI-driven threat detection and response capabilities for enhanced productivity and effectiveness.

Hedra Inc. | Industry: Media & Entertainment | Location: United States

Hedra helps marketers and prosumers create polished content by providing them with a generative media platform for end-to-end creation.

Inception Labs | Industry: Computers & Electronics | Location: United States

Inception Labs is creating a new frontier of LLM quality, speed and cost. Achieve 10x faster speeds, and 10x lower cost with Mercury, the first diffusion LLM.

Invisible Universe | Industry: Media & Entertainment | Location: United States

Invisible Universe built the Invisible Studio to help creators of all shapes and sizes make short-form videos using an AI native, end-to-end workflow solution built for storytelling.

LlamaIndex | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United States

​​LlamaIndex helps enterprises build agentic workflows to extract information, synthesize insights and take actions on the most complex documents.

Manifold Bio | Industry: Healthcare | Location: United States

Manifold Bio develops targeted therapeutics by combining AI-driven protein engineering with parallel in vivo testing.

NeuBird | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United States

NeuBird’s autonomous AI investigation platform helps IT teams resolve incidents in minutes, dramatically reducing resolution time and operational overhead.

Nexxa.ai | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United States

Nexxa builds specialized AI for heavy industries.

Pathway | Industry: Professional Services | Location: United States

Pathway builds real-time learning AI systems that mimic human cognition, advancing the understanding of LLM functionality and transforming model thinking capabilities.

Pluralis Research | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: Australia

Pluralis Research enables collaborative foundation model development through shared training protocols, allowing groups to collectively create and maintain AI models.

Ravenna | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United States

Ravenna’s AI help desk automates IT, HR and Ops support requests in Slack, enabling teams to deliver faster, more efficient internal service support.

Reevo.ai | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United States

Reevo unifies B2B go-to-market operations in one platform to boost productivity and accelerate deals.

Runloop AI | Industry: Computers & Electronics | Location: United States

Runloop provides the infrastructure platform for developers building the future of software engineering, by providing them with batteries-included devboxes and tooling.

Wondera AI | Industry: Music & Entertainment | Location: United States

​​Wondera enables easy music creation and publishing with AI agents and industry partnerships to unlock creative and revenue opportunities.

Europe, Middle East, and Africa

Hemispheric (Cognitiv) | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: Israel

​​⁠⁠Hemispheric is building the AI foundation for brain-computer interfaces.

Inephany | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United Kingdom

Inephany helps Machine Learning teams train models much faster, cheaper and more effectively by providing them with AI-powered optimisation solutions.

Jentic | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: Ireland

Jentic deploys AI agents with secure sandboxes and automated workflows, integrating seamlessly with existing infrastructure for full visibility and control.

Lettria | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: France

Lettria helps businesses (especially in regulated industries) turn unstructured data into actionable insights by offering a transparent, no-code AI GraphRAG platform.

Lisan | Industry: Software & Internet | Location: United Arab Emirates

Lisan AI delivers multilingual AI writing assistance and automated document generation tools to boost enterprise and government productivity.

Mimic Robotics | Industry: Robotics | Location: Switzerland

Mimic delivers AI-powered robotic solutions to automate complex manual tasks across retail and manufacturing industries with universal manipulation capabilities.

Orakl Oncology | Industry: Life Sciences | Location: France

Orakl Oncology accelerates drug development using AI-powered patient data analysis and predictive modeling to optimize research outcomes and reduce development risks.

VidLab7 | Industry: Multimedia & Design Software | Location: Germany

VidLab7 is revolutionizing sales by creating the AI Demo Platform — where every lead gets an instant, interactive demo, delivered by avatars.
